hero.name: Junhao Liao

highlights.yscope_dev: Develop new features and maintain existing codebase for open-source and proprietary projects.
highlights.uber: Integrated YScope's technologies to enhance observability with storage efficiency and high performance.
highlights.qualcomm_ft: RTOS Display Driver Development (DSI, DP SST/MST). ISO 26262 compliant software development. Cross-IP & SoC feature development & validation.
highlights.ta_2021: Received Teaching Assistant Award — Spring 2021. Supervised 4 student groups on GIS projects. Over 1,200 Piazza contributions, 2nd highest among all instructors.
highlights.qualcomm_intern: New DP features development. Improved code coverage infrastructure with Parasoft (+10%). Resolved static analysis issues to conform with MISRA C.

publications.asee: Liao, J., Zhang, H., Li, J., Xu, Y., & Timorabadi, H. (2022, August). WIP - iCtrl - A Remote Login Software Application. Paper presented at 2022 ASEE Annual Conference & Exposition, Minneapolis, MN.

ictrl.name: iCtrl
ictrl.description: 70,200+ downloads as of Feb 2026. Easily connect to the UofT undergraduate lab server — simplifies the tedious process down to 5 seconds.
